I get thoughts by sitting in the dark. My issue here is to trust to other people, even to myself. But I’ve grown the best out of this ridiculous life. With all troubles in my life I prefer making it simple yet tough. I don’t agree that hate does have significant connections with revenge.
;
;I have tasted some of bitterness and cold happiness in part of my life journey. Lost some best friend, friends and love ones, however I felt enough with the weep and grief of my old-happy-miserable life.
; I longed for real journey with someone who thinks can handle this sarcastic middleman dude. I can be so freakin emotional, with art in my head and dreams in my eyes.
;
;I always remember a past as my lucid day dream. Once they where there you cannot erase them. Co’z there’s a lesson we all have to learn, a process is far more important than the result itself. We all get hurt with sweet memories, even though they leave pain; it’s still sweet as before.
